item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30...am sure you will laugh and have a good tiime. CRISIS wil be the band. If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there....

BIG welcome to new dance family member Amy Keller...Yeeeehawww!

PS...Michelle will review the couple dance she taught last Saturday nite....
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
